name: Dextrose
overview: Dextrose AG is a privately held corporation based in Germany and was founded by Rocco Di Leo in September 2009. Dextrose is building the first commercial game engine for pluginless browser games. The Aves Engine is a professional game engine to build any type of web based 2D or 2.5D game by using HTML, CSS and JavaScript, giving game studios the power to deliver stunning games for all kinds of genres on multiple platforms.

acquisition.source_description: Zynga Continues International Expansion; Buys German Game Engine Developer Dextrose AG
